New issue

LevelDB throws un-handled exception doing Get #268

Closed
hcasa opened this Issue Nov 25, 2014 · 1 comment

Labels

None yet

Milestone

No milestone

Assignee

No one assigned

2 participants

hcasa commented Nov 25, 2014

After putting a key-value pair, when I try to read this value out, an un-handled exception was thrown at calling _Inside(const _Elem *_ptr) called by assign(v.data(), v.size()).

On the debugger, I see that v has the data and correct size. I am not sure why it is checking this if _Inside(). I see that the *this in the _Inside is NULL thus trying to read any members of it failed with an exception. I tried to modify this file however this xstring file is read-only so I assume that it must be well tested.

Can someone please take a look? I can provide more information? Really appreciate if anyone can shed some light.

Thanks,
Holly

hcasa commented Nov 25, 2014

Figured it out myself. The value argument needs to be initialized before calling Get().

cmumford closed this Nov 25, 2014
